summary: Full Stack Developer specialized in high-performance web applications and algorithmic logic. Background in mathematical modeling and data analysis.
about: Full Stack Developer and Data Analyst with over 6 years of experience. I specialize in building scalable web applications and implementing complex algorithmic logic. I combine strong foundational knowledge in data structures with a modern, high-performance stack (React, Node.js, Python). I actively integrate advanced AI tools into my workflow to optimize code quality and development velocity. Open to remote challenges.

details: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
Node.js, PostgreSQL, Supabase, SQL, Stripe, Cloudflare Stream
Workflow Optimization with LLMs (Claude, Gemini, Copilot)
C, C++, Java, PHP, SQL, Data Structures

experience.description: Architected and manage a VOD platform with complex subscription systems. Focused on performance optimization and rapid feature deployment.
experience.stack: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL, Stripe, Resend.

experience.description: Engineered a desktop application for creating and visualizing Game Theory (GTO) ranges. Implemented a visual grid editor with weighted decision logic (mixed strategies) and a real-time assistant using RNG.
experience.stack: Python, Tkinter (GUI), JSON, Algorithmic Logic, RNG.

experience.description: Designed a mathematical bankroll management system using solvers and multi-terabyte databases to predict Equity, EV, and risk based on statistical probability.
experience.stack: SQL, Big Data, Statistics & Probability, Solvers.

education.description: Graduated from the National Technological University (UTN), Argentina.
Constant research and application of AI technologies for software engineering (LLMs, Code Optimization).
